metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1773 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An attacker with the ability to generate session IDs or password reset tokens, either by being able to authenticate or by exploiting OSA-2020-09, may be able to predict other users session IDs, password reset tokens and automatically generated passwords. This issue affects ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 5.0.41 and prior versions, 6.0.26 and prior versions. OTRS; 7.0.15 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
